availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac Jackson Faubus (Jackson County, Kentucky, county judge)

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, county judge. Tennessee native. Married to Lavinah "Viney" Summers on November 23, 1834, in Washington County, Tennessee. Farmer in Laurel County, Kentucky, in 1850. County Judge in Jackson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel County, p. 41A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jackson County, My Division, p. 915.
Tennessee State Marriages (1780-2002), Nashville, Tennessee, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Washington County Marriages, Vol. 0, Sept. 1787-Dec. 1891, p. 82.
Find A Grave, "Isaac J Faubus (1814-1890)," Memorial #5353532 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5353532 (accessed April 9, 2020).
